alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mobile County through 545 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Theodore, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Theodore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
